template_description: Standard template for index.json files in system-of-systems architecture analysis

INSTRUCTIONS.component_paths: Use relative paths from repository root: systems/SYSTEM_NAME/COMPONENT_ID/service_architecture.json
INSTRUCTIONS.component_ids: Use lowercase with underscores: bluesky_queueserver, not bluesky-queueserver
INSTRUCTIONS.components_format: Flat dictionary mapping component_id to relative file path
